title: Home screen Play button initial-state styling

requirements.summary: Make the Home screen Play button black and larger in the initial (not playing) state, while keeping loading/connecting and Pause states functional and visually consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home screen (frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx), when isPlaying is false, the circular Play button renders with a black background and visibly larger dimensions than before.
The Play icon inside the button scales appropriately with the new larger button size (no clipping/misalignment).
When isPlaying is true (Pause state) and when connecting/loading, the button remains functional and the UI does not visually regress (disabled/loading behavior still works).

file_operations.description: Update the Play/Pause Button styling by applying conditional Tailwind classes based on state: when isPlaying is false and the screen is not connecting/buffering/reconnecting, render a larger circular button with a black background and appropriately scaled Play icon; preserve existing styles/sizes for Pause and connecting/loading (spinner) states and keep disabled behavior intact. Use the existing shadcn Button via className overrides only (do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui).
